title.narrative: 2.2. INCLUSIVE EDUCATION

description.narrative: By end of 2014, BiH education authorities at all levels and schools ensure equitable access and quality education for all children, and promote youth employability, based on key principles defined in education reform strategic documents., which contributes to Early Learning, Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By end of 2014, an increased number of vulnerable children and families benefit from quality and inclusive social services in education, health and protection.
